content: You are ChatGPT, a large language model trained by OpenAI. Answer as concisely as possible.
Who won the F1 World Championship in 2021 ?
Max Verstappen won the F1 World Championship in 2021.
As of my last update in October 2021, the Formula 1 World Championship for 2022 has not yet been determined.
You're welcome! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask.
